metadata.Title: CVE-2020-35964 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
track_header in libavformat/vividas.c in FFmpeg 4.3.1 has an out-of-bounds write because of incorrect extradata packing.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-35964` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ffmpeg - 7:4.4-1
libavcodec-extra - 7:4.4-1
libavcodec-extra58 - 7:4.4-1
libavcodec58 - 7:4.4-1
libavdevice58 - 7:4.4-1
libavfilter-extra - 7:4.4-1
libavfilter-extra7 - 7:4.4-1
libavfilter7 - 7:4.4-1
libavformat-extra - 7:4.4-1
libavformat-extra58 - 7:4.4-1
libavformat58 - 7:4.4-1
libavutil56 - 7:4.4-1
libpostproc55 - 7:4.4-1
libswresample3 - 7:4.4-1
libswscale5 - 7:4.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7:4.4-1').
